name: Yorick To (not) be Out of the Box - demo
name_original: Yorick To (not) be Out of the Box - demo
description:
Puzzle game Help Yorick, this Shakespearean cat trapped in a box, to escape its prison. In a world where it can be and not be, be dead OR alive - remember, we are watching it, its wavefunction collapsed thus it can't be seen as a superposition of the death and live state), - your help is all it has.

How to play:

Arrows to move;

R to reset level;

mouse to interact with buttons and menu. 

Extra resources used:

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/atmospheric-puzzles

SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/atmospheric-interaction-sound-pack

Background: https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator

Font: Shwumatik.

All resources used are under the CC0 license.
